description: Only a disease can have a material basis
When the exposure material reported is blank, the exposure material ID must also be blank.
The exposure material ID must match the exposure material reported.
note: When exposure_material_reported is not blank, then create a tuple x = (exposure_material_reported, exposure_material_id); generate a list of tuples X for each row in external as (external.label, external.id); then check that x is in X.

description: When the disease reported is blank, the disease stage must also be blank.
The disease ontology ID must match the disease reported.
When the exposure process is "occurrence of disease" then the disease reported must be provided.
When an infectious disease is reported, the material reported must be the material basis for that disease.
